comment.author: 68061336@N05
comment._content: Commonwealth War Graves Commission lists following details OLDROYD, JIM Rank:Private Service No:42010 Date of Death:24/08/1916 Age:20 Regiment/Service:Machine Gun Corps (Infantry) 7th Coy. Panel ReferencePier and Face 5 C and 12 C. MemorialTHIEPVAL MEMORIAL Additional Information: Son of George and Clara Oldroyd, of 17, Trinity St., Mirfield, Yorks. can be found here www.cwgc.org/search-for-war-dead/casualty/807177/OLDROYD,...

comment.author: 68061336@N05
comment._content: Jim Oldroyd serivice record show that he was age 20 working as a miner and had served in West Riding TA when he was called up on 21st May 1916 his address is shown as Station Road Mirfield Yorks his was 5 feet 7 inches tall
